name: End Ecocide El Rio De Aguas
goal: The goal of this organization is to halt the environmental degradation, which if allowed by the EU to continue,  will destroy the livelihoods of humans and the death of this eco-system protected under ES 6110002, protected under ZEPA, ZEC and LIC. European English SPA, SAC and SCI.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
UN Special Rapporteur for UN Special Procedures concerning the Human Right to a Safe and Sustainable Environment.
Denouncements against the illegal extraction of water.
Criminal case applied for against the illegal extraction of water.
Denouncement against infringement of SAC directives.
Presentation of a citizens "ordenance" for the Junta De Andalucia.
Demand for water extraction from the aquifer to be reduced to sustainable levels. A drop of 400%, or else the aquifer will be unusable in five years.
